duties_responsibilities.duty: Maximize store profitability without compromising the customer experience and exceed organization's financial and performance goals.
Engage regularly with the Doctor to touch base on business needs, associates, and customer experience.
Hire, train, coach, develop, and support store associates to ensure a flawless customer experience.
Plan and oversee incoming traffic, doctor appointments, and scheduled eyewear services.
Lead, execute, and improve all broad operational activities to meet the store's financial and customer experience goals.
Manage the company's online presence, optimizing the website and social media channels.

education_certification.credential: HS Diploma or GED required; Bachelor’s degree preferred. Current State Opticians License required.
